data.name: The Overlord Isn't Another Isekai Protagonist, Is He? - Chapter 1
data.detailed_description:
Visual novel, Dating simulator, Hidden Object Game.

In this game you can develop romantic and sexual relationships with both male and female characters.

STORY

Have you ever wondered what awaits you after death? At 25, Kay had no plans to die... let alone to wake up in literal HELL one day.
Did he deserve such a fate, or is it all just a ridiculous mistake? Kay can’t remember his past, but he firmly believes that he doesn't belong here.
The freshly minted incubus is ready to do anything to uncover the mystery of his death and figure out what happened. Even if he has to bring the Hell to its knees for it.

FEATURES


❤️ A story of love, betrayal and friendship in the rhythm of infernal cyberpunk.

❤️ 5+ love interests

❤️ Animated characters

❤️ The ability to explore the world around you and interact with locations

❤️ Full English voice over

data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Sexual content, nudity, strong language, alchocol and drugs use.
